content.rendered:
Military Connected Support Staff

Jesse Martinez

Military Connected Admissions Liaison
Office: (909) 448-4961
jmartinez@laverne.edu

Lilly Guerra

Academic Advising Support, Military-Connected Students
Office: (805) 986-6906
lguerra@laverne.edu
 

Briceida Munguia

Military Connected Student Accounts Liaison
Office: (909) 448-1446
bmunguia@laverne.edu

Jen Brace

Certifying Official
Office: (805) 986-6903
jbrace@laverne.edu
 

Diana Towles

Veteran Center Coordinator
Office: (909) 448-4940
dtowles@laverne.edu
